Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BmKb1 (MeuFSPL-1; natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram+ bacteria S. aureus (MIC 16 ug/ml), M. luteus (MIC 81.5 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 48.8 ug/ml), Gram- E. coli (MIC 18.1 ug/ml), and P. aeruginosa (MIC 90.8 ug/ml). Also active against B. cereus CGMCC 1.1846 (LC 15.33 uM), B. megaterium CGMCC 1.0459 (lethal concentration LC 2.10 uM), B. subtilis CGMCC 1.2428 (LC 4.74 uM), M. luteus CGMCC 1.0290 (MIC 2.26 uM), methicillin-sensitive S. aureus CGMCC 1.89 (MIC 5.27 uM), penicillin-sensitive S. epidermidi P1111 (MIC 7.36 uM), methicillin-resistant coagulase-negative S. aureus p1369 (MIC 8.48 uM), MRSA P1374 (LC 6.16 uM),  penicillin-resistant S. epidermidis P1389 (LC 2.81 uM), MRSA p1386 (LC 6.24 uM), PRSE P1389 (LC 7.36 uM), S. aureus J685 (LC 14.72 uM), S. aureus J698 (LC 4.8 uM), S. aureus J700 (LC 10.92 uM), S. aureus J706 (LC 10.92 uM), S. aureus J708 (LC 10.92 uM), S. aureus J710 (LC 10.92 uM), S. sanguinis ATCC 1.2497 (LC 5.2 uM),  S. salivarius ATCC 1.2498 (LC 4.8 uM),  S. mutans ATCC 1.2499 (LC 4.22 uM), S. warneri ATCC 1.2824 (LC 2.81 uM), S. griseus NBRC 13350 (LC 6.81 uM), and S. scabiei CGMCC 4.1765 (LC 1.77 uM).Structure: helical in 50% TFE.The same sequence has been identified in another scorpion (see AP2974). found in multiple species.  updated 5/2015; 4/2018.
Literature Information.Author: Zeng XC, Wang SX, Zhu Y, Zhu SY, Li WX.2004
Literature Information.Title: Identification and functional characterization of novel scorpion venom peptides with no disulfide bridge from Buthus martensii Karsch
